procedures.title: Unpacking and Initial Setup
steps: Inspect shipping carton for damage.
Open carton and remove all packaging materials.
Check included parts against packing list.
Place unit on a flat and stable surface.
Allow unit to acclimate to room temperature if recently transported.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit is safely unpacked and ready for installation.

procedures.title: Countertop Placement and Power Connection
preconditions: Unit has been unpacked and inspected
steps: Position the unit away from wall for adequate ventilation.
Ensure clearance around unit as per manual recommendations.
Connect power cord to a grounded electrical outlet of the specified voltage.
Verify unit is resting level.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit is installed in a suitable location with proper electrical connection.

procedures.title: Standard Operation Mode
steps: Press the Power button.
Use the control panel to select 'Standard Operation' mode.
Adjust timer and temperature as needed.
Press Start.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit operates in Standard mode as configured.

procedures.title: Safety Lock Activation
steps: Press and hold the Safety Lock button for 3 seconds.
Confirm lock symbol appears on display.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit controls are locked and protected from unintended operation.

procedures.title: Safety Lock Deactivation
steps: Press and hold the Safety Lock button for 3 seconds.
Confirm lock symbol disappears from display.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit controls are unlocked and ready for use.

procedures.title: Cleaning Exterior Surfaces
steps: Wipe exterior with damp, soft cloth.
If necessary, use mild detergent on stubborn stains.
Dry with clean, soft cloth.
procedures.expected_outcome: Exterior is clean and free of residues or buildup.

procedures.title: Cleaning Removable Components
preconditions: Removable components cool enough to handle
steps: Remove tray and accessories as specified.
Wash components in warm, soapy water.
Rinse thoroughly and dry completely.
Reinstall components once dry.
procedures.expected_outcome: Removable components are clean and reinstalled correctly.

procedures.title: E01 Error Code - Power Failure
steps: Disconnect unit from power supply.
Check outlet for power.
Reconnect unit and power on.
If error persists, contact service.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit resumes normal operation or a service request is initiated.

procedures.title: E02 Error Code - Voltage Out of Range
steps: Unplug unit immediately.
Verify supply voltage matches specifications.
Reconnect only if voltage is within range.
If error persists, contact qualified electrician.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit receives proper voltage and error is cleared.

procedures.title: E03 Error Code - Sensor Fault
steps: Power off and unplug the unit.
Wait 5 minutes, then reconnect power.
Restart unit and check for error.
If error remains, schedule service inspection.
procedures.expected_outcome: Sensor issue is reset or referred for professional maintenance.

procedures.title: E04 Error Code - Overheating Detected
steps: Shut down and unplug the unit.
Allow unit to cool for at least 30 minutes.
Ensure vents are not blocked.
Reconnect power and resume operation.
If error recurs, arrange professional servicing.
procedures.expected_outcome: Unit operating temperature is restored and error cleared.

procedures.title: Routine Maintenance - Ventilation Checks
steps: Inspect intake and exhaust vents for dust or obstructions.
Clean surfaces as required.
Confirm that airflow is unobstructed.
procedures.expected_outcome: Vents are clear, allowing for proper cooling and operation.
